name: Panic Grumpz - A Game Grumps Fan Game
name_original: Panic Grumpz - A Game Grumps Fan Game
description:
Hey Gamer! What are you doing today? Are you going on an Adventure? That’z great! Because I wanna go on a Butthole sniffing Adventure - with you! COOOME OOON!

                                                                                    

Here weeEEE GOOOOOO:

In this Retro Platformer you are the Video Game Boy, you are the one that wins! But to win you have to face fierce Enemies, battle great Bosses and gamble your Way to Victory.

At the Moment just the bare Minimum of Features is implemented.

You can Jump, Attack and hopefully avoid the Enemies.

Get to the end of the Stage to reach the Goal.

Meshs & Textures are kept super simple to get the Base of this Game done as fast as possible.

                                                                   

The Idea:

The Goal is to create a Game that both Grumpz  can play and enjoy like they did with Panic Restaurant:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cRnHTLx8cBQ

For this Game to get done in a Month, I need your help.

You are good with 3D Modelling, an aspiring 2D Animator or have amazing Ideas for Game Grumps References we can add in the Game, leave a Comment.

Maybe we are even that fast or successful, that we can add a Nightmare Mode with Levels along the Lines of Ross’s Mario Maker or add a Jump & Shoot Game Gyaru “DLC” (Jump’n’Shoot Gals) after completing the Main Game.
